name: ADG Promotional Products
overview:
We are a leading supplier of a wide range of products within the branded promotional industry, as evident by our Top 40 Supplier ranking by Counselor.

Organization’s Goal

Maintain a Foundation of a Partnership with Each Unique Distributor through Each Successful Customer Experience.

* We Can Only Accomplish This Objective By: Ensuring Timely and Knowledgeable Service
* Offering Competitive Pricing for Mutual Profitability
* Providing Reliable, Quality Products
* Developing Innovative Marketing Solutions

The full range of services and products we offer are designed to make it easy for all of our Distributors to provide their end-user Customers with consistent, reliable, and productive marketing solutions.

Our web site, www.adgpromo.com, provides a fast, cost-efficient and simplified e-commerce solution that is designed to streamline the process of sourcing and pricing products. Not only can you search for the appropriate items to meet your needs, but you can also create a virtual example of what the final Imprinted product will look like.

Importantly, all four of our brands can be researched and ordered via the following communication points: # Email: service@adgpromo.com # www.adgpromo.com

Product Sourcing, Availability and Selection

We have relationships with more than 1,000 domestic and overseas suppliers that offer more than 16,000 specialty items. These relationships provide us with excellent pricing and product availability. As a consequence, we commonly deliver rush orders in a matter of days and not weeks or months.

In order to avoid disruptions in our supply chain, we source from multiple vendors and work with overseas manufacturers, when time permits, to secure the best possible pricing.

Customer Driven Culture

The best internal procedures and capabilities are worth little without the commitment of our Employees to make your experience with us one of your very best vendor relationships.
